questions.question_text: Swāminārāyaṇah sākshād ______________; Sarvebhyah paramām shāntim ānandam sukham arpayet. ॥ 1 ॥
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 1.

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ātmānu sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to chintāmaṇi chhe.
questions.explanation: This is from Swamini Vato 1/26.

questions.question_text: Durlabho nashvarash-chā'yam ______________ maḷato nathī. ॥ 2 ॥
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 2

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi; ne āpaṇe paṇ karoḍ janma dharyā chhe, paṇ koī vakhat āvo jog maḷyo nathī. Nīkar shu karavā deh dharavo paḍe?
questions.explanation: This is from Swamini Vato 1/19.

questions.question_text: Laukik vyavahār to ______________ māṭe chhe. Te ā manuṣhya janmanu param lakṣhya nathī.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 3.

questions.question_text: Karoḍ kām bagāḍīne paṇ ek mokṣha sudhārvo ne kadāpi karoḍ kām sudhāryā ne ek mokṣha bagāḍyo to temā shu karyu?
questions.explanation: This is from Swamini Vato 1/14.

questions.question_text: Sarva doṣhone ṭāḷavā, brahma-sthitine pāmavā ane ______________ karavā ā deh maḷyo chhe.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 4.

questions.question_text: Āpaṇe paṇ e Akṣharrūp je mukta temanī panktimā bhaḷavu chhe ane Akṣhardhāmmā jaīne akhanḍ Bhagwānnī sevāmā hajūr rahevu chhe, paṇ nāshavant ne tuchchh evu je māyik sukh tene ichchhavu nathī ne emā koī ṭhekāṇe lobhāvu nathī.
questions.explanation: This is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 21.

questions.question_text: Ā badhu ______________ avashya prāpta thāya chhe. Āthī mumukṣhuoe sadāya satsang karavo.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 5.

questions.question_text: jyāre āvo sant-samāgam prāpt thayo tyāre deh mūkīne jene pāmavā hatā te to deh chhatā ja maḷyā chhe; māṭe jene parampad kahīe, mokṣh kahīe tene chhate dehe ja pāmyo chhe.
questions.explanation: This is from Vachanamrut Gadhada অন্ত্য 2.

questions.question_text: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu ______________ vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”
questions.explanation: This is from Swamini Vato 1/17.

questions.question_text: Jan pratye jīvan kahe, jene jeṭalo satsang; Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy bāher bhītar bhang.
questions.explanation: This is from Bhaktachintamani 84.

questions.question_text: Tethī Parabrahma Swāminārāyaṇe ā lokmā sākṣhāt avatarīne ā ______________ sthāpanā karī.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 6.

questions.question_text: Aksharnā vāsī vahālo, āvyā avani par, Navkhaṇḍ dharatīmā Swāmī, chhatrāyā chāle rāj… Akshar ṭek Avani par āvī vahāle, satsang sthāpyo, Hari janoṇe kol, kalyāṇno āpyo rāj… Akshar 1
questions.explanation: This is a kirtan by Sadguru Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Ā satsangnu gnān mumukṣhuone thāya evā shubh āshayathī ‘______________’ e nāmnu shāstra rachavāmā āve chhe.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 7.

questions.question_text: Ane satsangī paṇ ene ja kahīe; kem je, satyarūp evo je potāno ātmā tathā satyarūp evā je Bhagwān teno jene āvī rīte sang thayo tene satsangī kahīe.
questions.explanation: This is from Vachanamrut Gadhada અંત્ય 39.

questions.question_text: Dīkṣhā eṭale ______________, shraddhāe sahit evo achaḷ nishchay, samyak samarpaṇ, prīti-pūrvak niṣhṭhā, vrat ane dṛuḍh āsharo.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 10.

questions.question_text: jem ā līmbaḍānu vṛukṣh chhe te ek vār jāṇī līdhu chhe, pachhī koī rīte manmā sankalp thato nathī je, ‘Līmbaḍo hashe ke nahī hoy?’ Evī rīte game teno sang thāy ane game tevā shāstra sāmbhaḷe paṇ koī rīte karīne Bhagwānnā swarūpno je nishchay karyo hoy temāthī man ḍag-mage nahī, evo je nirutthānpaṇe Bhagwānno nishchay ene ame tadātmakpaṇu kahīe chhīe.
questions.explanation: This is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Madhya 14.

questions.question_text: Ā shāstramā Parabrahma Sahajānand Paramātmāe darshāvel āgnā tathā ______________ paddhatine spaṣhṭa rīte jaṇāvī chhe.
questions.explanation: This is from Satsang Diksha Shlok 11.

questions.question_text: Keṭalāk siddha thāy chhe ne keṭalāk sarvagna thāy chhe ne keṭalāk devatā thāy chhe ityādik anant prakārnī moṭyap pāme chhe tathā param padne pāme chhe e sarve Bhagwānnī upāsanāne baḷe pāme chhe, paṇ upāsanā vinā koī vāt siddha thatī nathī.
questions.explanation: This is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 56.
